channel.title: [PI] shops problem
channel.description:
I cant get shops to work, i did everything correctly as in I Vain I tutorial.
added into npc2.py [code]def npcClick2_2538(c, npcId): c.getShops().openShop(33)[/code]
added into shops.cfg [code]shop = 33 danny 2 2 882 50000 884 50000 886 1500 888[/code]
that should of done it right? even if it didnt i did this
added into actionhandler.java [code]case 2538: c.getShops().openShop(33); break;[/code]

item.title: [PI] shops problem
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

By default, ScriptManager is not enabled.

Make sure it is implemented/running correctly.

Also, make sure the ActionHandler isn’t using the same NPC for another task.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] shops problem
item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

[quote=“dannydude8, post:1, topic:365677”]I cant get shops to work, i did everything correctly as in I Vain I tutorial.

added into npc2.py

def npcClick2_2538(c, npcId): c.getShops().openShop(33)

added into shops.cfg

shop = 33	danny		2	2	882	50000	884	50000	886	1500	888

that should of done it right? even if it didnt i did this

added into actionhandler.java

case 2538: c.getShops().openShop(33); break;[/quote]

Didn’t add an amount to item #888 for starters.

Did you use tab in the right spots?

Read full topic
